external_games.name: Cities: Skylines II - Deluxe Relax Station

name: Cities: Skylines II - Deluxe Relax Station
summary: Drift into a world of tranquility with Deluxe Relax Station, where ambient melodies and soothing soundscapes gently envelop you. This radio transforms your city building session into a harmonious journey, setting the perfect auditory scene for creativity and calm.
